Text: WARNING: While these are probably the best subtitles available at the moment, it is clear that they have been translated through the use of artificial intelligence rather than human. Most of the film is easy enough to discern, but there are several instances where the dialogue makes absolutely no sense.

These subtitles are really bad and hard to follow if you're primarily an english speaking person. I'd suggest finding one with better subtitles rather than watching this if you don't wanna ruin your movie experience. 

Great quality though! ;)
